name: Alternative Choice Home Care Nursing, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Alternative Choice Home Care Nursing, LLC is a Home Health provider based in Aurora, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $42.7M in Medicaid payments across 17K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $42.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
